headline: Start by applying for the upcoming batches.
description: The Build Program happens twice a year - Both during Fall and Spring Season. We help you to build better projects and share professional experiences from various domains in tech/non-tech.

headline: Choose a track you want to apply for.
description: There are 2 tracks you can choose for - Full Stack Engineering Track & Designing Track (pref. UX/UI Design)

headline: Listen to what past builders have to share.
description: We select people who are creative in terms of engineering and design, who knows how to build and ship stuff in a team or without a team as a solo builder. If you're passionate like them, you're at the right place.
